structure.unit: KENTUCKY ALCOHOL AND OTHER DRUG ABUSE PREVENTION, INTERVENTION, AND TREATMENT LAW

law.history: Repealed 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 20, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 49, effective July 14, 2000; and ch. 536, sec. 28, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 310, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998; and ch. 426, sec. 499, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 442, sec. 2, effective July 14, 1992.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Substance Abuse, Pregnancy, and Women of Childbearing Age Work Group -- Membership -- Duties -- Expiration of section.
